subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: In the aftermath of being decimated by the Dallas Mavericks in the first two games of the N.B.A. finals, a huge question hangs in the humid air: Will the real Shaquille O'Neal show up tonight in Miami?
snippet: In the aftermath of being decimated by the Dallas Mavericks in the first two games of the N.B.A. finals, a huge question hangs in the humid air: Will the real Shaquille O'Neal show up tonight in Miami?
